page_content: Discusses the increase in COVID-19 cases in Kanton St.Gallen and the measures taken by the government, including data collection in clubs and bars.
Provides information on eFiling, a fully digital method for submitting tax returns using the eTaxes software.
Discusses the management of hazardous substances and organisms, outlining the responsibilities and safety measures for businesses.
Provides a support request form for issues related to eTaxes software.
Offers various publications, reports, and forms related to agriculture in the Kanton St.Gallen.
Provides career planning information for those interested in becoming a prosecutor in Kanton St.Gallen.
Discusses the responsibilities and procedures for groundwater protection zones, including legal frameworks and community roles.
